citation: Proclamation under the Dangerous Goods (Road and Rail Transport) Act 2010 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Dangerous Goods (Road and Rail Transport) Act 2010

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Dangerous Goods (Road and Rail Transport) Act 2010 fix 1 January 2011 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

6 December 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. J. O'BYRNE

Minister for Workplace Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 December 2010

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
